azurerm_lb_nat_pool.description: Manages a Load Balancer NAT Pool.

name.description: Specifies the name of the NAT pool.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the resource.

loadbalancer_id.description: The ID of the Load Balancer in which to create the NAT pool.

frontend_ip_configuration_name.description: The name of the frontend IP configuration exposing this rule.

protocol.description: The transport protocol for the external endpoint. Possible values are `Udp` or `Tcp`.

frontend_port_start.description: The first port number in the range of external ports that will be used to provide Inbound Nat to NICs associated with this Load Balancer. Possible values range between 1 and 65534, inclusive.

frontend_port_end.description: The last port number in the range of external ports that will be used to provide Inbound Nat to NICs associated with this Load Balancer. Possible values range between 1 and 65534, inclusive.

backend_port.description: The port used for the internal endpoint. Possible values range between 1 and 65535, inclusive.

id.description: The ID of the Load Balancer NAT pool.

create.description: Used when creating the Load Balancer NAT Pool.

update.description: Used when updating the Load Balancer NAT Pool.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Load Balancer NAT Pool.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Load Balancer NAT Pool.
